channel.title: Incredibly Easy TUT (for backrounds/sigs/what ever)
channel.description:
OK, I just started PhotoShop not to long ago, and when I was playing around with it I found this worked decently so.... ya, we're shooting for something like this (made it for someone else) -> [img]http://img295.imageshack.us/img295/8637/n00b1copyks8.jpg[/img]
Or something bigger, the size doesn't matter much it's just what your feelin' like :P
OK, open up a new file, I'm just gonna use 500X500 for now. [img]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/8084/500x500ye4.jpg[/img]
Now change your first color, leave the second one black. For the first one were using a light gray, cbcbcb works fine. Now click Filter > Render > difference clouds
Hit ctrl+f 3 times.
Now go to Filter > liquify Just do ... a lot of random swirls. Spins, lines, jags, all that, all on the entire picture. ->[img]http://img216.imageshack.us/img216/2378/notfinishedwaveymg1.jpg[/img]
Now make sure it covers up the whole screen. Should look like -> [img]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/7418/finishedwaveyrk1.jpg[/img]
OK, lets colorize it. Press ctrl + u and check off Colorize
Put the saturation to 100 Set the Lightness from -30 to 0 Choose any Hue, thats just the color.
Now we have it colored, should look somethin like this -> [img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/6149/coloredoa2.jpg[/img]
OkieDokie, from here add your text/render/pic what ever. I'll be adding a render and text.
Text: Choose your favorite text. High light all of it, and in the styles tab, click the gray square box, this should make the inside of your letters empty. -> [img]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/9158/emptytextph9.jpg[/img]
Now get your magic wand, its the ... wand in your bar on the left...thing... what ever, click inside each letter while holding shift. On the last one click edit > copy merged
Now press ctrl+d and then ctrl+v. Move your text into place where it fits exactly infront of the other text. Press ctrl+u and check Colorize again. Now put the saturation at 100 and the Lightness at 0. Choose a color that stands out from the others. ->[img]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/2595/withtextxa0.jpg[/img]
OK, almost done, even though this part is optional.
render: go ahead and add your render, and anything else you need. Final Product >
[img]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/1746/waveybackroundbl6.jpg[/img]
OK, so I did this for first photoshoppers, just like me. I know it's not that great, and I'm tired, post back comments and rates and such

Now change your first color, leave the second one black. For the first one were using a light gray, cbcbcb works fine. Now click Filter > Render > difference clouds

Now go to Filter > liquify
Just do … a lot of random swirls. Spins, lines, jags, all that, all on the entire picture.
->

Now make sure it covers up the whole screen. Should look like ->

OK, lets colorize it. Press ctrl + u and check off Colorize

Put the saturation to 100
Set the Lightness from -30 to 0
Choose any Hue, thats just the color.

Now we have it colored, should look somethin like this ->

Text:
Choose your favorite text. High light all of it, and in the styles tab, click the gray square box, this should make the inside of your letters empty. ->

Now get your magic wand, its the … wand in your bar on the left…thing… what ever, click inside each letter while holding shift. On the last one click edit > copy merged

Now press ctrl+d and then ctrl+v. Move your text into place where it fits exactly infront of the other text. Press ctrl+u and check Colorize again. Now put the saturation at 100 and the Lightness at 0. Choose a color that stands out from the others.
->

OK, almost done, even though this part is optional.

render: go ahead and add your render, and anything else you need. Final Product >

OK, so I did this for first photoshoppers, just like me. I know it’s not that great, and I’m tired, post back comments and rates and such
